mapper.select: SELECT `cash_prod_id` AS `cashProdId`, `cash_prod_name` AS `cashProdName`, `diamond_num` AS `diamondNum`, `cash_num` AS `cashNum`, `seq_no` AS `seqNo` FROM `withdraw_cash_prod` WHERE `cash_prod_id` = #{cashProdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT `cash_prod_id` AS `cashProdId`, `cash_prod_name` AS `cashProdName`, `diamond_num` AS `diamondNum`, `cash_num` AS `cashNum`, `seq_no` AS `seqNo` FROM `withdraw_cash_prod` ORDER BY `seq_no`
